name: Stay Alive But Random
description:
The Theme Of GMKT Game Jam 2020 Was Out Of Control. So I Went With The Idea Of Creating A Game That Player Cannot Control Where They Shoot. And Let Me Tell You Game Became So Hard. There 3 Modes In The Game :

  • Random Attack Position Mode : In This Mode The Hit Position Locate Itself Randomly On The Screen.
  • Around Player Position  Mode: In This Mode The Hit Position Rotates Around The Player. (This Mode Is Bugged Because Of The Bullets)
  • Cursor Position Mode : In This Players Can Change The Attack Position's Position With Their Cursor However The Player Loses The Ability Of Controlling Themselves.
  • Auto Aim Mode : Attack Position Locates Itself On A Random Enemy.

During The Game Crates Randomly Spawn Around The Player That Changes The Game's Mode Or The Player's Weapon Or They Heal Up The Player Or Kill All Enemies.

Some Enemies Have Guns.

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys For Movement
  • Left Mouse Click For Shooting
  • If You Are Inside The Cursor Mode Your Mouse Will Change Attack Position

Known Bugs

  • Both Enemy And Player Bullets  Stop When Reached Attack Position.
  • Game Loading Is Slow (I Hope It's Because Of My Internet Hopefully It Should Be Ok For You Guys)
  • No Audio Feedback? (I'm Not Sure Of This)
